name: Rocket Ridge
description:
Rocket Ridge

A game developed by Madelyn Firestone at Azusa Pacific University.

Contact: delynfirestone@gmail.com

Description

"Rocket Ridge" is a first-person 3D adventure game. Explore the crash site of an abandoned rocket and solve the mystery of the ship by collecting rocket pieces to power the ship and captain logs. Each log adds to the mystery of the crashing and each rocket piece leads you closer to revealing the truth.

Note: This game was created as a project for a game development class.

Controls

WASD to move. Shift key to sprint. Spacebar to jump.

Credits

UI and HUD elements designed by Madelyn Firestone. All other game assets are courtesy of the Unity Asset Store. SFX is provided by pixabay and freesound. Music by Royalty Free Music.
